abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews dance tribute to choreographer Geoffrey Holder,  performed by Garth Fagan Dance company, at Damrosch Park as part of Lincoln Center Out of Doors festival.
lead_paragraph: Lincoln Center Out of Doors hosted a day of events honoring Mr. Holder, who would have been 85 on Saturday, a program that also featured Carmen de Lavallade, his widow.

headline.main: Review: Garth Fagan Dance Honors Geoffrey Holder Along With Carmen de Lavallade
headline.print_headline: Recalling a Multifaceted Talent Along With the Love of His Life

snippet: Lincoln Center Out of Doors hosted a day of events honoring Mr. Holder, who would have been 85 on Saturday, a program that also featured Carmen de Lavallade, his widow.
